Author: menloparkbum
Content: This article reads like he really, really wanted to tell everyone the story about finding the rogue alarm clock at his neighbor's apartment, but didn't have a good reason to publish it, so he added a couple paragraphs at the end about how being anal makes a person good at finding bugs. It did not flow together well.

Author: jamiequint
Content: Except they don't do consulting, there are only 2 of them, and running Pragmatic Studios is their full time job. The point is moot anyway, there is way more Rails work floating around right now then could go to a select group of 50 (ish) people.
